```{r}
year_events_df <- read.csv("year_events_data.csv")
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
```




```{r}
year_events_df %>% 
  select(-1) %>% 
  slice(1:5) %>% 
  kable(col.names = c("Hazard", "Number of events", "Year"), caption = "Here is a caption")
```
